summary: A grandson of a recently deceased millionaire mistakes a beautiful female disc jockey for her aunt, who once dated the grandfather.
cast: Deanna Durbin|Donald O'Connor|John Dall|Charles Winninger|Helena Carter|Margaret Wycherly|Jean Adair|The Williams Brothers|Jacqueline deWit|Jan Peerce|Patricia Alphin|Polly Bailey|William Bailey|Audrey Betz|Stanley Blystone|Betty Blythe|June Bright|Ralph Brooks|Eddy Chandler|Tom Chatterton|William Ching|Della Clark|Chester Clute|Bert Davidson|Boyd Davis|Hal K. title: El diablillo ya es mujer
